CustomField.description: Set to TRUE if the email address for the account's parental contact is updated If the checkbox gets set to true, a BP "Propagate Changed Parental Email checkbox to related contacts" is fired which updates the Parental_Email_Updated__c field on related contact records
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Set TRUE if the email address for the account's parental contact updated which fires, a BP "Propagate Changed Parental Email checkbox to related contacts" is fired which updates the Parental_Email_Updated__c field on related contact records
CustomField.label: Parental Email Updated
